So the install instructions got me worried this was going to be a difficult install, especially on 64-bit.

But all I had to do was Install, open the patch folder, move the .dll from the crack folder into C:Program Files (x86)DVDFab 8 Qt (replacing the original) and run DVD Fab. 
They all say "Never Expire" and run perfectly so Im not sure what the long confusing instructions was for.

Windows 7 Ultimate 64-bit.

Thanks for the download
